SELECT PT.PALLET_NO, PT.PALLET_TYPE, CASE PT.USED_FLAG WHEN '1' THEN '启用' ELSE '禁用' END AS USED_FLAG, PT.PRODUCT_GUID, PT.BINDING_TIME, CASE PT.LOAD_STATUS WHEN 1 THEN '有载' WHEN 0 THEN '无载' ELSE '异常' END AS LOAD_STATUS, PD.MATERIAL_NO, PD.PRODUCT_DATE, PD.PRODUCT_GRADE, PD.BATCH_NO, PD.REQUEST_NO, PD.PLAN_NO, CASE PD.PASS_FLAG WHEN 0 THEN '未放行' WHEN 1 THEN '已放行' WHEN 2 THEN '锁定' ELSE '异常' END PASS_FLAG, PM.MATER_SPEC, PM.MATER_DESC, PM.MATER_MKIND, PM.MATER_TYPE FROM PSB_PALLET PT LEFT JOIN PSB_PRODUCT PD ON PT.PRODUCT_GUID = PD.PRODUCT_GUID LEFT JOIN PSB_MATERIAL PM ON PM.MATER_NO = PD.MATERIAL_NO
PT.PALLET_NO like '%'||#where.PALLET_NO#||'%'
PD.MATERIAL_NO like '%'||#where.MATERIAL_NO#||'%'
PD.BATCH_NO like '%'||#where.BATCH_NO#||'%'
PD.PRODUCT_DATE >=#where.BTIME#
PD.PRODUCT_DATE <= 1+#where.ETIME#
ORDER BY PT.USED_FLAG DESC, PT.BINDING_TIME DESC
